about_the_game:
Thank you for taking interest in the Fantasy Gladiators: Legendary Edition!

This DLC unlocks all the Legendary content in the Fantasy Gladiators. By purchasing this expansion, you are supporting our INDIE Game Development company, and helping us with bringing you more games.

All proceedings from this expansion will go towards the development of our new games and support of INDIE Game Development communities.

Fantasy Gladiators: Legendary Edition grants you access to all gladiators and arenas.

  • 10 New Gladiators
  • 3 New Arenas
  • Orc Gladiators
  • Nordic Gladiators

Cheer for your new gladiators as they hack and slash for your cause.

This DLC unlocks all the Legendary content in the Fantasy Gladiators. By purchasing this expansion, you are supporting our INDIE Game Development company, and helping us with bringing you more games.

All proceedings from this expansion will go towards the development of our new games and support of INDIE Game Development communities.

name: Fantasy Gladiators: Legendary Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel 1.2 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel (R) HD Graphics or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game might run on lower specs, but that configuration will not be supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10
  • Processor: Intel 1.6 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce or ATI Graphic Accelerator
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Fantasy Gladiators: Legendary Edition grants you access to all gladiators and arenas.
